Buttons

Simplify Admin expands the already great button .btn variations provided by bootstrap to include even more button styles and colors.

It also provides utilities to make your life easier.

Button Variations
Basic Buttons

Add .btn .btn-[variation] to any <button> or <a> for stylized buttons. Button variations are shown below:

Outline Buttons

Use .btn-outline-[variation] for outline only button

Flat Buttons

Use .btn-flat-[variation] for flat material style button

Pill Buttons

Add .btn-pill to any button style variation (normal, flat or outline) to use buttons with round sides

Example .btn-pill on outline buttons

FAB Buttons

Add .btn-fab to any button variation to use round action button

FAB Button Variations

You Add .btn-fab to any button style or color variation, here's a demo of fab outline buttons

FAB Button Variations

You Add .btn-fab to any button style or color variation, here's a demo of fab outline buttons

More Custom Colors

Add .btn .btn-[color] to any <button> or <a>.

Button Group

Wrap buttons in a btn-group for a Button Group

Button Sizes
Small Buttons

Add .btn-sm to any button variation to use a smaller button

Block Buttons

Add .btn-block to any button variation or size to use a full width button

Large Buttons

Add .btn-lg to any button variation to use a larger button

Mix it up!

Experiment! Here's a block outline only pill button! .btn-lg to any button variation to use a larger button

Experiment! Here's a block outline only flat button! .btn-lg to any button variation to use a larger button

Choose a Dark Sidebar Theme

Choose a Light Sidebar Theme
